Posts.Content:
I to am really worried my doc found lots of lumps on both my breat and told me they look like little stars with black dots and told me that 95 per% of the time thiss is cancer but I am waiting I have a bio to pass on the 4 of aug but it feels so so long and even my daughter is struggling to keep sain my husband lost his father 10 years ago I lost min 3 to prostate cancer my aunt lost both breast 15 years ago and it has now retuned more severly she is on her last few mile's and I have 3 othe aunts that r in remission so yesi am so scared and worried and I have not friends and really no1 to chat with about
 my concerns and things that bother me right now so thanks for reading my post.. 
I am in my late 40's , 
 xx oo penny
Posts.Title: Burning sensation and pain in left breast

Posts.Content:
thank it's been very stressful lately it's the not know what's going on with my own body but know that something is wrong and the change's my body is going though and my family watching how hard this is on me and I see there face's in the morning and how they talk to me how you doing this morning mom or my husband when we are being intimate, I am hurting you dear maybe we should not sorry I don't mean to get into thing's with a perfect stranger I just don't have any1 to talk to right now I don't do the social thing and really have no close friend's, I just need to vent sometimes and right now this place seem's to be the only place I found that read's or listen's to me so I am sorry I won't say anything eles if you don't want me to I am scared and alone right now thank you sorry 
penny and what is it exactly that you have and how are you doing and how do you handel you pain and stress.
I love my life my daughter husband,
